vulnerabilities.description:
debian/openssl@1.1.1n-0+deb11u1 has a high severity vulnerability identified by CVE-2022-3996: CVE-2022-3996 openssl. This vulnerability was fixed in version 3.0.7-2.
2 packages import debian/openssl@1.1.1n-0+deb11u1 directly. See the list of all dependency paths for details.
vulnerabilities.detail: This package version contains a vulnerability that has been marked as high severity according to the information in OSV.dev.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade debian/openssl to version 3.0.7-2 (current: 1.1.1n-0+deb11u1, latest: not available).

2 packages import debian/openssl@1.1.1n-0+deb11u1 directly. See the list of all dependency paths for details.
vulnerabilities.detail: This package version contains a vulnerability that has been marked as medium severity according to the information in OSV.dev.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Upgrade debian/openssl to version 3.0.13-1~deb12u1 (current: 1.1.1n-0+deb11u1, latest: not available).

vulnerabilities.description:

debian/bash@5.1-2+b3 is a direct dependency of jscott932/app-java-demo@latest.

vulnerabilities.recommendation: Update jscott932/app-java-demo@latest to use debian/bash version 5.2-1 (current: 5.1-2+b3, latest: not available).
